text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxBusiness Obamagate is merely your conspiracy theory to distract from the coronavirus death count, the firing of the IG, the Ruined economy etc. pure bullshit! Such an embarrassment to this country. #GOPCorruptionOverCountry #TrumpIsAMoron #MoronInChief
